0001.png.haiku:
Empty hallway hums
Lights flicker without a name
Steps wait to be heard

0002.png.haiku:
Door left half open
Neither welcome nor refusal
Air holds its breath still

0003.png.haiku:
Last bus idles here
Destination scraped away
Night reads the schedule

0004.png.haiku:
Carpet smells of time
Patterns worn by passing lives
No one stays long now

0005.png.haiku:
Stairwell without end
Echoes choose no direction
Up forgets down here

0006.png.haiku:
Office after dark
Screens glow with unfinished work
Chairs face no one home

0007.png.haiku:
Swimming pool at dusk
Water waits without a sound
Rules lose their meaning

0008.png.haiku:
Mall before sunrise
Locked gates dream of voices lost
Music hums alone

0009.png.haiku:
Hospital corridor
Shoes whisper what words cannot
Time moves on soft wheels

0010.png.haiku:
Fogged glass entryway
Inside and outside dissolve
Here is not yet there

scene01.glb.haiku:
Unloaded platform
Tracks stretch past the final sign
Arrival pauses

scene02.glb.haiku:
Ceiling lights blink once
Power waits for someone else
Room holds its shape still

scene03.glb.haiku:
Empty lobby clock
Minute hand refuses time
Now repeats itself

scene04.glb.haiku:
Parking lot at dawn
Lines promise order and rest
Nothing chooses yet

scene05.glb.haiku:
Bare room, white and quiet
Corners watch the open door
Purpose not assigned
